import Axios from 'axios'; import React, { Component } from 'react' import DebutantModal from './DebutantModal' export class NiveauDebutant extends Component { state={ question: [] } componentDidMount() { this.getNiveau(); } getNiveau = () => { Axios.get('questiondebutant') .then(response => { console.log(response.data) this.setState({ debutant: response.data.debutant }) this.setState({ question: response.data.questions }) }) } render() { const niveau = this.state.debutant return (

Test Chauffeur {niveau.titre}

Numero Test Reponse Action
1 Vitesse maximum taxi-brousse? 75 Km/h
) } } export default NiveauDebutant
